name: Bavel
description: Located in Downtown Los Angeles, this Middle Eastern restaurant features cuisine from Chefs Ori Menashe and Genevieve Gergis.

name: Broken Spanish
description: Located in Downtown Los Angeles, this Modern Mexican restaurant features cuisine from Chef Ray Garcia.

name: Konbi
description: Located in Echo Park, this daytime restaurant features Japanese-inspired sandwiches, French pastries, and coffee.

name: Republique
description: Located in the heart of Los Angeles, this French restaurant serves dishes by Chefs Walter Manzke and Margarita Manzke

name: Rossoblu
description: Located in Downtown Los Angeles, this Italian restaurant serves handmade pasta made fresh every day.
